overview.en:
55 Exchange is the first worldwide token exchange organized with autonomous community and real-time information supervision. 
55 Exchange delivers the consensus to create an autonomous community owned, shared and governed by all. Supervision system runs through info collection and aims to protect traders by spreading messages for all members simultaneously. Instead of changing the ‘form’, emphasis has been put on the ‘substance’, namely the quality and efficiency of information. Four innovations, attained by 55 Exchange, are known as information supervision, SICO mechanism, BoB (Brain of Blockchains) project diagnosis and AutoRobust Transaction as Mining system.
overview.zh: 55交易所是全球首家实时信披社区自治通证交易所。55交易所作为新一代社区自治交易所，以“共有、共治、共享”为基本原则，首次提出了在实时信披基础上的社区自治，让项目信息对投资者公开，以信息对称为前提保护投资者的利益。具有社区化交易所“社区化、交易挖矿、持币分账” 等特性，更注重解决“内容侧”的质量和效率：（1）实时信披机制: 把与通证价值相关的关键信息实时披露给投资者；（2）SICO机制：新一代通证发行与监督机制。以价值投资理念为核心，强调信息的公开和社区监督；（3）链脑-智能通证评测系统：高效甄别优质项目，提高项目筛选效率；（4）自平衡挖矿机制：稳定释放速度，提高交易挖矿的持久性。
